definition: The German word "Laub" refers to the foliage or leaves of trees and plants. It is commonly used to describe the fallen leaves during autumn or the overall collection of leaves in a specific area.

examples.german: Das Laub fällt im Herbst von den Bäumen.
examples.english: The leaves fall from the trees in autumn.

examples.german: Ich habe das Laub im Garten zusammengekehrt.
examples.english: I swept the leaves together in the garden.

examples.german: Das Laub raschelt unter meinen Füßen.
examples.english: The leaves rustle under my feet.
The children play in the pile of leaves.

examples.german: Im Park gibt es viele Bänke unter den Laubbäumen.
examples.english: There are many benches under the deciduous trees in the park.
